title: Fortune-telling Is Just a Hint
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>So what is my fortune, Nozomi-san....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let's see.... It seems your relationship with people close to you may change soon. The key is for you to be proactive, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>People close to me.... Would that be my sister....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You can think of it as anyone you've had a long relationship with.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Lanzhu! It might be Lanzhu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It might. You two are childhood friends, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>If I'm proactive, I may change our relationship.... That means I should take the initiative from now on, right? I've always been passive when dealing with my sister and Lanzhu, so I often get pushed around by them. This might be my chance to change that....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I'm glad you're taking my fortune-telling seriously, but don't get swept up by it, alright? Just think of it as a hint and be yourself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Y-, you're right. I'm sorry. My sister asked me to go touring with her on a bike, and Lanzhu invited me for some winter swimming, both of which are a bit much for me.... I was hoping I could suggest a different activity instead....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oh.... Well, maybe you should do that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
